appinfo.about:
Wnmp 2.0.9: Released: 03/07/2014 ******************************** - Wnmp Control Panel 2.2.1
* Fixed: The million tooltips that would show up if you hovered over the buttons a few times. * Fixed: Calling session_destroy results in 502 gateway error. (#23)
- Nginx
* Updated to 1.5.11
- PHP
* Updated to 5.5.10
- phpMyAdmin
* Updated to 4.1.9
